ModMetaData.name: ZeroTech-Power
ModMetaData.author: LingLuo
ModMetaData.description: 语言Languages:简体中文,English ----------简体中文---------- 零子科技-电力拓展包 添加了数种适合基地运营前后期的电力设备,可以帮助殖民地更好的进行电力管理. 物品简介: 一次性电池:能够提供3000Wd电量的电池,无法充电,电力耗尽后会自动销毁. 超空间电池:一个能够储存无限能量的电池,但每储存1000Wd会降低电池的效率. 土豆发电机:通过消耗土豆发电的装置. 反粒子发电机:利用反粒子炮弹进行发电的装置. 心智反应堆:通过高级次生核心发电的装置. 认知灯炉:通过标准次生核心发电的装置. 无尽反应堆:一个可以通过投入高级零部件提升发电量(无上限)的装置. ----------English---------- Zero Tech - Power Expansion Pack The addition of several kinds of power equipment suitable for the pre-and post-operation of the base can help the colony better manage power. Item Description: Disposable battery: The battery that can provide 3000Wd power cannot be charged and will automatically destroy after the power runs out. Hyperspace battery: A battery that is capable of storing unlimited energy, but reduces the efficiency of the battery for every 1000Wd stored. Potato generator: A device that generates electricity by consuming potatoes. Antiparticle generator: A device for generating electricity from an antiparticle projectile. Mental reactor: A device that generates electricity through an advanced secondary core. Cognitive lamp furnace: A device that generates electricity through a standard secondary core. Endless reactor: A device that can increase power generation (unlimited) with the input of advanced components.
